image_schemas.name: Container
image_schemas.description: In-out orientation, arising from the experience of putting objects in and taking them out.

image_schemas.name: Part-Whole
image_schemas.description: Understanding an object as a whole composed of smaller constituent parts.

image_schemas.name: Path
image_schemas.description: A schema involving a source, a destination, and a sequence of points in between.

conceptual_metaphors.name: Arithmetic Is Object Collection
conceptual_metaphors.source_domain: The physical activity of collecting objects. This includes actions like putting objects into collections, taking them out, and forming larger collections from smaller ones.
conceptual_metaphors.target_domain: The abstract domain of numbers and arithmetic operations.

mappings.Numbers: Collections of objects are conceptualized as numbers

conceptual_metaphors.name: Arithmetic Is Object Construction
conceptual_metaphors.source_domain: The physical activity of constructing objects by putting parts together.
conceptual_metaphors.target_domain: The abstract domain of numbers and arithmetic operations.

mappings.Numbers: Objects made of ultimate, indivisible parts are conceptualized as numbers

conceptual_metaphors.name: Measuring Stick
conceptual_metaphors.source_domain: The use of physical segments (like a measuring stick, a string, or body parts) to determine length.
conceptual_metaphors.target_domain: The abstract domain of numbers and arithmetic operations.

mappings.Numbers: Physical segments are conceptualized as numbers

conceptual_metaphors.name: Arithmetic Is Motion Along a Path
conceptual_metaphors.source_domain: The physical act of moving along a path from a source to a destination.
conceptual_metaphors.target_domain: The abstract domain of numbers and arithmetic operations.

mappings.Numbers: Point-locations on a path are conceptualized as numbers
